About

    Hi, I’m Tilak Tamang, an IT student and I am currently pursuing a Bachelor in Information Technology (BIT) at Himalayan White House International College, located in Putalisadak, Kathmandu, Nepal. I am originally from Ramechhap District, Nepal, but currently reside in Dillibazar, Kathmandu, for my further studies. I have programming skills in C, C++, and JavaScript and a solid understanding of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. While I am still improving, I have a keen interest in web design and am familiar with tools like Photoshop and Canva. Additionally, I have experience in data entry using MS Word, PowerPoint, and Excel. I also possess video editing skills, with proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut, and KineMaster.
